body: I sent an email to support giving you the donator :). I was originally going to give it to ViolentBoo but he said he was done with the server :(. Enjoy the gold and avicore!

You should be able to move it over as long as you lose yours.

replies.body: The rank is used to show that a user supports the server in an important way, and when a user whom has not done this receives the rank, it is misleading and inaccurate. The server also loses the opportunity to receive support from the user whom is given the rank.
replies.body_tagged: The rank is used to show that a user supports the server in an important way, and when a user whom has not done this receives the rank, it is misleading and inaccurate. The server also loses the opportunity to receive support from the user whom is given the rank.

replies.body: It's misleading as we don't support it. It's possible we will support it in the future if I'm able to set it up with our server expenditure tracking utility.
